name: 1987 Turn Back the Clock SWIPE - thr33smas Insert - #3MAS1
description:
The First Day of thr33smas

First card in a series of 12 cards looking back at the highlights of the first 7 months of thr33som3s mints. 
 
"On Sunday, August 22, 2021, thr33som3s closed his LinkedIn account. This irreversible move wiped out 12 years of corporate executive experience and over 1300 prominent contacts with a couple clicks. That world has disappeared from the rear view mirror."

Later that day, thr33som3s minted a couple of commemorative mints and airdropped them to active, engaged members of the Grotto.  

This thr33smas version is a new painting of that original mint.

The 12 Days of thr33smas is a chase 3v3nt.  Collect all 12, #3MAS1 through #3MAS12, in the announced timeframe to receive #3MAS13 via airdrop.

This card is an INSERT. It has all established Standard Insert Utility and may compound additional Utilities over time. It is the very first thr33smas Insert and a Holiday Insert. ***** digital capture of original painting, gouache on vintage baseball card, 2021. ************ NFT image is for personal use, no commercial rights are granted. Twitter @thr33som3s and IG @thr33somes to see upcoming cards and new series. ************ ALL thr33som3s have FUTURE UTILITY.
